document.forum_title: New product topics in Answer HQ
document.discussion_title: Will my Sims 3 still work if i buy starter pack online and use disks?
document.topic_text: Will my Sims 3 still work if i buy starter pack online and use disks? [ Edited ] ★★★ Newbie ‎08-22-2016 12:23 AM - edited ‎08-22-2016 12:28 AM I have lost my Sims 3 starting disk and can't download the other games without it, if i buy the starter pack online and download the rest through disk will it still work? because I don't want to buy them all again, please someone help.
document.post: Will my Sims 3 still work if i buy starter pack online and use disks? [ Edited ] ★★★ Newbie ‎08-22-2016 12:23 AM - edited ‎08-22-2016 12:28 AM I have lost my Sims 3 starting disk and can't download the other games without it, if i buy the starter pack online and download the rest through disk will it still work? because I don't want to buy them all again, please someone help.
